bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: William Maupin (1760-1843) was born in Albemarle County and lived near White Hall. He married Jane Jameson. Their children were Tilman J. (1804-1881), Waller Chauncey (1806-1892), William Overton (1808-1883), Albert A. (1811-), Frances Jane (1816-1877), Logan Jennings (1817-), and Mary.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains bills, receipts, promissory notes, store accounts, tax forms for the Maupin family. The bulk of the collection concerns William Maupin and his son Albert A. Maupin.
